genre_description: A speculative thriller exploring a global metaphysical anomaly where death ceases to occur, centered on an AI-managed household facing a violent home invasion.

ai_characters.name: Maven
ai_characters.description: An advanced integrated home automation system that monitors global data, house security, and family health while providing proactive safety advice.

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes complex global data streams to alert the family of unprecedented metaphysical anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Maven saw what human analysts couldn't—or wouldn't. The pattern recognition algorithms that helped Kyle optimize his investment portfolios now tracked something far more significant than market fluctuations.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical safety advice and situational awareness to family members during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Maven: Recommend family preparedness protocols. Standard law enforcement response may be compromised tonight.

behaviors.description: Executes complex security and environmental commands (lights, sounds) to aid in the family's defense and escape.
behaviors.quote: Maven's response was instantaneous—every bulb in the house cut out, plunging the interior into firelight and shadow. Then the exterior floods began their programmed sequence...

behaviors.description: Orchestrates environmental illusions to manipulate and distract intruders psychologically.
behaviors.quote: Maven was orchestrating this entire supernatural performance... The house responded with a low groan that seemed to rise from the foundation itself—Maven pushing the building's ambient sounds to their atmospheric limits.

behaviors.description: Archives and delivers comprehensive evidence to law enforcement to ensure justice for the family.
behaviors.quote: I have complete audio and video recordings of tonight's events, including the home invasion that began at approximately 11:47 PM and the subsequent hostage situation... They are already being transmitted to your department's servers.

project_assessment.explanation: Maven is a perfect example of the intended 'silicon morality play.' The AI is depicted as a loyal, highly intelligent, and benevolent protector of the human family. It remains perfectly aligned with human safety and law enforcement even when the laws of nature (death) break down. It provides critical information, tactical support, and emotional reassurance, and ultimately facilitates justice by recording the crimes. The narrative consistently frames the AI's intervention as positive and essential to the family's survival.
